about_the_game:
DLC Heroes is adding the ability to summon experienced warriors and magicians with unique abilities:
  • 4 heroes with melee skills. Beyond being powerful warriors, the heroes possess auras of different actions on the player's dwarves;
  • 2 support heroes who attack from afar or restore the health of the dwarves;
  • 1 battle mage who casts spells of mass destruction;
  • 2 heroes who specialize in the extraction, collection, and production of resources.

DLC Features:
  • To summon the hero from the portal, you need to create and erect its statue in a safe place.
  • The hero and their statue are inextricably linked. If the statue is destroyed by monsters, the hero also dies.
  • The recipes for the statues of heroes include special figurines that begin to appear in Grant's Shop in random order at every player level starting at level 6(!).
  • The more figurines a player uses, the faster they become more expensive.

With their large supply of health and stamina, the heroes will be a great help to you, especially at difficult levels of the game.

Try them all and choose the one you like most according to your style of gameplay!
